replies.body: How is that even close to being abusive?
Saying someone is bad is just one of those things that are better left unsaid, not only is it rude but it also puts said player on tilt and only makes them perform worse.
if its the first thing thats said during the game then its also probably one of the worst things to say. srsly gimme a "kill yourself" over this shit any day :(
I'd say toxic. There's better ways to tell people they suck.

I don't believe saying "You're just bad" is toxic but it is a bit rude and there are nicer ways to say "Try a different champion has this may not be the right one for you." or "This isn't your champion, try a different one." because being bad at League of Legends is possible but there is 1 role/champion everyone is extraordinary at for example I'm quite good at Support/Thresh but I suffer in the Attack Damage Carry position as I normally take tons of damage and feed. (unintentionally)

As long as it negatively affects the mental capacity of the receiver it's toxic. Imo they've got to be pretty bad themselves to say "You're just bad" instead of helping them over the game. 
We had a guy feeding once in ranked, and another player encouraged, helped and promised a skin: and the feeder carried :/
I don't believe so, i mean if their bad then their bad and its true.

Bronze 2***

If you're gonna troll then troll properly.

no, it's not toxic.
people are bad. stop trying to live in this super PC world where everyone's a winner.
